sourcesContent:
import { BOT_STEPS } from "../consts/chatConsts";

export const getBotMessageByStep = (step, name='') => {
    switch (step) {
        case BOT_STEPS.INTRO:
            return `Hi, I’m Maya! Today you’re going to help me to ace my game.`
        case BOT_STEPS.ASK_NAME:
            return `Let’s start by telling me your name`
        case BOT_STEPS.NICE_TO_MEET:
            return `Nice to meet you ${name}!`
        case BOT_STEPS.NICE_TO_SEE:
            return `Nice to see you again ${name}. Let’s pick this up from where we left off`
        case BOT_STEPS.DESCRIBE_PROCESS:
            return `Alright, this is how it’s going to work`
        case BOT_STEPS.ASK_MATH_EXPRESSION:
            return `List any mathematical expression you can think of - I’ll crunch it in no time`
            case BOT_STEPS.BOT_FEEDBACK:
            return `This was easy, give me something harder ;)`
        default:
            return ``
    }
}
